empty.title: Everything is empty...
empty.desc: Looks like there's no content to be displayed.

tips.settings_sync: Você pode fazer login para salvar suas configurações online e sincronizar com outros dispositivos.
tips.theme: Você pode alterar a paleta de cores do aplicativo acessando %s > %s > %s > %s
tips.lang: Você pode alterar o idioma do aplicativo acessando %s > %s > %s > %s

not_found.title: Config not found
not_found.desc: Sorry, we couldn't find the requested config.

theme.title: Theme
theme.desc: Choose the color scheme that will be used to display %s.

auto.name: Auto
auto.example: Theme selected based on your device's setting.

light.name: Light theme
light.example: This is the light theme, great for places with high light.

dark.name: Dark theme
dark.example: This is the dark theme, great for places with low light.

amoled.name: AMOLED
amoled.example: This is the AMOLED mode. In compatible devices, this mode can help to save battery.

empty_search.title: No results
empty_search.desc: We didn't find translations with the given name. Check if you spelled it correctly and try again.

empty_files.title: You don't have translations yet
empty_files.desc: Create or import translations by pressing "%s" button.

request_permission.title: Let us access your camera.
request_permission.desc: Para que possamos fazer a leitura dos sinais, é necessário que você nos dê permissão para acessar sua câmera.
